subject: Automobile Racing
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: Nico Rosberg, Nelson Piquet Jr. and Kazuki Nakajima, three sons of former Formula One drivers, probably resemble one another more than they do their famous fathers.
snippet: Nico Rosberg, Nelson Piquet Jr. and Kazuki Nakajima, three sons of former Formula One drivers, probably resemble one another more than they do their famous fathers.
